snippet: Windows Vista can display up to three different clocks when the taskbar time is clicked.
lead_paragraph: TIP OF THE WEEK Working in multiple time zones? Windows Vista can display up to three different clocks when the taskbar time is clicked. Go to the Start menu to Control Panel, open the Date and Time control panel and click on the Additional Clocks tab. Pick out the desired time zones and check the box to show each new clock, then click the O.K. button. J. D. BIERSDORFER

headline.main: Tip of the Week: Working in Multiple Time Zones
